channel.title: Welcome to CtrlReturn
channel.description: Dive into the intersection of music and Python at ctrlreturn.de Berlin's ultimate live coding event. Experience real-time music creation, workshops, and the unique vibes of our vibrant community. Unleash your creativity with Python programming like never before. Join us for a tech-meets-music adventure!

item.title: Welcome to our Audio Video Blog
item.description:
FoxBox v2

This video shows some FoxDot code executed with my new outdoor mobile audio system “FoxBox”
Find more info on my website !
